data.title: 1156). Sepulcher of Queen Blanche
data.meta_description: Prints of Blanche of Navarre (1137-1156). Queen Consort, wife of Sancho III, king of Castile. Our beautiful Wall Art
data.text:
Mary Evans Picture Library Photo Prints and Wall Art

Blanche of Navarre (1137-1156). Sepulcher of Queen Blanche d

Blanche of Navarre (1137-1156). Queen Consort, wife of Sancho III, king of Castile. Sepulcher of Queen Blanche depicting her death giving birth to her son, the future King Alfonso VIII of Castile. Relief. Romanesque style. 12th century. Monasterio de Santa Mari?a la Real. Najera. La Rioja. Spain. Mary Evans Picture Library makes available wonderful images created for people to enjoy over the centuries. Â© Thaliastock / Mary Evans

Media ID 32224836

12th Alfonso Birth Blanca Blanche Castile Castilian Childbirth Dead Died Maria Monastery Najera Navarra Navarre Newborn Real Rioja Romanesque Sancho Sarcophagus Sculpted Sepulcher Viii Garces

Framed Prints

Experience the rich history and intrigue of the Middle Ages with our exquisite Framed Print from Media Storehouse. This stunning artwork, "Blanche of Navarre (1137-1156). Sepulcher of Queen Blanche d" by Rights Managed from Mary Evans Prints Online, captures the poignant moment of Queen Blanche's death during childbirth, giving birth to the future King Alfonso VIII of Castile. This beautifully detailed and evocative print transports you back in time, offering a glimpse into the life of this remarkable queen consort. Perfect for history enthusiasts, art collectors, or anyone seeking to add a touch of the past to their home or office decor. Order now and let this masterpiece tell its story in your space.

Photo Prints

Bring a touch of medieval history into your home with our exquisite print of 'Blanche of Navarre' from the Media Storehouse collection. This evocative image, sourced from Mary Evans Prints Online, depicts the Sepulcher of Queen Blanche, who tragically passed away during childbirth, giving birth to the future King Alfonso VIII of Castile. With her regal bearing and intricate details, this rights-managed print is a stunning addition to any wall, transporting you back in time to the 12th century. Ideal for history enthusiasts, art collectors, or anyone seeking to add a touch of the past to their decor. Order now and bring a piece of the past to life in your home.

This captivating image, rights managed from Mary Evans Prints Online, showcases the poignant moment of Queen Blanche of Navarre's (1137-1156) tragic death during childbirth, giving birth to her son, the future King Alfonso VIII of Castile. Each print boasts stunning detail and vibrant colors, making it an exceptional addition to any history or art enthusiast's collection. Order yours today and let the story of Queen Blanche unfold in your home or office.

Jigsaw Puzzles

Discover the captivating history of Blanche of Navarre with our exquisite jigsaw puzzle from Media Storehouse. Featuring the hauntingly beautiful Sepulcher of Queen Blanche d'Evreux, this puzzle brings to life the poignant moment of her death during childbirth, giving birth to the future King Alfonso VIII of Castile. Immerse yourself in the rich detail of this intricately designed puzzle, perfect for history enthusiasts, puzzle collectors, or anyone seeking a challenging and rewarding pastime. Let the story of Blanche of Navarre unfold piece by piece in your hands.
